Stage manager's record of "The Red Mill" BV Red Mill
1 volume(s) (approximately 180 p., many blank)
[1906â€“1908] "The Red Mill," an operetta with music by Victor Herbert to a libretto by Herbert Blossom, premiered on Broadway at the Knickerbocker Theatre in 1906. For further details about this item, and to request it for research, please read its catalog record, or write to manuscripts@nyhistory.org.
